statements: SELECT * FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecastingData ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM DemandForecastingData GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM DemandForecastingData ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE demand_quantity < 50 AND production_scheduling_id = 20 ORDER BY forecast_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(demand_quantity), MIN(demand_quantity), AVG(demand_quantity) FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT forecast_date, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM DemandForecastingData GROUP BY forecast_date HAVING total_demand > 500 ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY forecast_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastingData;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecastingData ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE forecasted_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM ProductionScheduling;
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM ProductionScheduling ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecastingData WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(forecasted_demand) AS total_demand FROM DemandForecastingData GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT p.product_id, p.forecasted_demand, s.production_id, s.production_date FROM DemandForecastingData p JOIN ProductionScheduling s ON p.product_id = s.resource_id;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM DemandForecastingData GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_data ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, SUM(forecasted_demand) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM production_scheduling WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date;
SELECT resource_name, allocated_quantity FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_quantity < 50 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_data ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(forecasted_demand) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM production_scheduling GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_records DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT resource_name, SUM(allocated_quantity) AS total_allocation FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY resource_name ORDER BY total_allocation DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM production_scheduling ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_line FROM production_scheduling WHERE production_line = 'Line 1';
SELECT resource_name, allocated_quantity FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(forecasted_demand) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecasting GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM production_scheduling WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT production_line, COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM production_scheduling GROUP BY production_line ORDER BY total_schedules DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_data;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_date FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecasted_demand > 100;
SELECT id, production_date, production_quantity FROM production_scheduling WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'Labor' ORDER BY allocated_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_data ORDER BY forecasted_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, production_quantity FROM production_scheduling WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'Labor' AND resource_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY allocated_date;
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM integration_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
